Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.ui.controller

Class DispatcherController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.ui.controller.DispatcherController
All Implemented Interfaces:
LambdaObserver, java.lang.Runnable
public class DispatcherController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, LambdaObserver
Single class through which all messages are received. The messages call the various methods of this class to be handled. After updating the view with the needed/new data, they are forwarded to CLIMessageHandler or GUIMessageHandler for UI specific handling.

    • handleSetupAction

      public void handleSetupAction​(ServerSetupActionMessage message)
      This message is received by ALL users. Only the user indicated in the message proceeds to handle its contents. This method updates the player's warehouse before passing the message to the UI for handling.
      Parameters:
      message - handleable.

    • handleSetupUser

      public void handleSetupUser​(ServerSetupUserMessage message)
      This message is received by ALL users. Only the user indicated in the message proceeds to handle its contents. This method updates the player's faith track before passing the message to the UI for handling.
      Parameters:
      message - contains resource number, 4 leader cards, a faith track and the addressed user.

    • handleStartTurn

      public void handleStartTurn​(ServerStartTurnMessage message)
      This message is received by ALL users. Only the user indicated as starting in the message proceeds to handle its contents. This method contains references to the players starting and ending their turn and sets the relative parameters.
      Parameters:
      message - Contains two users.

    • handleWarehouse

      public void handleWarehouse​(ServerWarehouseMessage message)
      Handles updates to the warehouse. Returned after tidy warehouse.
      Parameters:
      message - contains warehouse and corresponding user.

    • handleBoughtMarbles

      public void handleBoughtMarbles​(ServerBoughtMarblesMessage message)

    • handleThrowResource

      public void handleThrowResource​(ServerThrowResourceMessage message)

      public void handleFaithTrackMessage​(ServerFaithTrackMessage message)
      Notifies of changes to any players faith track.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to be handled.

    • handleChooseWhiteMarbles

      public void handleChooseWhiteMarbles​(ServerChooseWhiteMarblesMessage message)

    • handleDisconnectionGameSetup

      public void handleDisconnectionGameSetup​(DisconnectionGameSetupMessage message)
      Disconnection message received during the setup phase. Differently from the normal one, this signals that the game is being closed and needs to be restarted.
      Parameters:
      message - the message object

    • handleGameReconnection

      public void handleGameReconnection​(ServerGameReconnectionMessage message)
      Message received when reconnecting to a game. Contains ALL the view information and updates it, setting any parameter that may need to be set.
      Parameters:
      message - the message containing all the view data.

    • handleGameSaving

      public void handleGameSaving()
      Ends the game by closing the connection when a player as requested to save.

    • handleStatus

      public void handleStatus​(StatusMessage message)
      This is the handler for any and all status messages. They are simple messages that do not contain data, and can be received at multiple stages of the game. Since they do not contain information beside their meaning, all the handling is delegated to the UI specific handlers.
      Parameters:
      message - the status message.

    • handleLastTurns

      public void handleLastTurns​(ServerLastTurnsMessage message)
